pamini pirisen pirisak pahara dima pamanak aramuna wuwada athama kandayam pamina thibune depala saha thawath laba prayojana labaganima sadahaya minuwangoda nagaraye mathpan alawisala kadima saha atham wyaparika sthanawala mudala saha depala sorakam kirim eyata hodama nidasuna wana ladi mema gatumen muslim wyaparika sthana menma sinhala wyaparika sthana rasak da haniyata pathwima matha nagaraye poduwe siyalu wyaparika sthana walata siduwu alabayak wiya.ee nisa mema praharaya jathiwadi praharayak nowa awasthawadi praharayak washayen artha dakwiya hakiya kisiweku nosithu mohothaka kisiwekuta palanaya kirimata nohaki mohothaka siduwu maha winashaya minuwangodin nathara kirimata hakinam api jathiyak washayen dinumya nathinam thawath kalu juliyak nirmanaya wima walakiya nohakiya esenam kala yuththe kumak da wadihiti piris ape samajaye tharunayan game tharunayan palanaya kara ganima aniwarya katayuththaki owunta mehi barapathala kama saha adinawa pahada dan sansun wime awashyathawaya pahada dimaya eeye sawasa 6.00 pamana nadunana yathurupadi walin pamini pirisak nagaraye katunayaka guwan thotupala wetha praweshawana margaye athi ahara alawi salata pamini pirisa mulinma pahara dena ladi .

dengu maduru mardana katayuthu pilibanda madhyawedin danuwath kirima sandaha pawul saukhya karyanshaye pawathi madhya hamuwak amathamin ohu me bawa eeye (13) prakasha kara sitiyeya.meratin dengu maduruwa thuran kirima sandaha wana wadapiliwelata sahaya dakwamin siyaluma polis sthanawalata polispathiwaraya mangin chakralekhayak nikuth kara thibe.shri lanka polisiye sahaya menma dengu maduru mardana katayuthu sandaha thriwidha hamudawe sahaya da me wana wita uparima aakarayen labemin pawathiyi.mita amatharawa dengu maduru mardana katayuthu sandaha wasthu widyagnyayange sahaya da laba ganimata saukhya amathyanshaya thiranaya kara atha.wasthu widyawata anuwa gruha nirmana ha udyana alankaranaya pramithiyata anuwa sidu kirimenda dengu maduru uwadurata yam wisandumak labe yayi saukhya amathyanshaye athireka lekam waidya palitha mahipala mahatha pawasayi.
